thread.section_title: Healthier Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Healthier Choice | healthierchoice.ie
thread.title: Paula

author: Paula
title: Paula
text: In the U.S. it is very hard to find a true tobacco flavored product. Healthier Choice Platinum is the best product I have found to get a vaping experience that keeps me off the cigarettes. My only complaint is that selection of size and strength can be limited, and delivery time can be lengthy. I would love to see Healthier Choice provide a tracking number on its orders.
